description.en:
Multi-work series list:
1. Highschooler Hits a Jackpot at the Arcade, Gets Tangled Up With a Shota and Treats Him Like a Grown Up / Medal Game de Ooatari Shitara Shota ni Karamareta no de Otona no Taiou o Shite Ageru JK (メダルゲームで大当たりしたらショタに絡まれたので”大人の対応”をしてあげたJK)
2. The Brothers Visit the House of the Onee-san That Always Gives Them Tokens at the Arcade / GaCen de Itsumo Medal o Kureru Onee-san no Ie ni Agarikonda Kyoudai (ゲーセンでいつもメダルをくれるお姉さんの家に上がり込んだ兄弟)
3. That Time I Went to Karaoke With the Older Onee-san / Toshiue no Onee-san to Karaoke Kita Toki Aruaru (年上のお姉さんとカラオケ来た時あるある)
